message: This is awesome! So you take a good idea, and you guys all team up to make it happen! Nice, im applying

www.LetsMakeAStartup.com - For all you YC applicants that want to have fun, get to know each other, and make a cool project together. We will decide on an idea in the next few days, and everyone will be messaged with more info! Afterall, we are all pretty intelligent, most of us have successful startups on our own, imagine if we teamed up!
www.LetsMakeAStartup.com - Apply at the bottom, chat at the side (or chat here)
If you have funds -- we are always open to investors/co-founders with funds :) http://www.SpotBanks.com

@becomingguru Hachi warms any cold call - it helps you connect smartly with anyone you want to reach out to (or connect with). Just input the name of the person, and Hachi will search thru all your social networks to find the best person to ask for a personal intro. Demo video at http://www.gohachi.com/ . If interested, ping me at rachna@hachilabs.com
@rachnaspace We should talk. My email is lakshman@lakshmanprasad.com One important thing tho': The word "coder" is derogatory. "Programmer" Or "Developer" is the prevalent wisdom
hachi, what do you guys do?
mine the network graphs from linkedin twitter facebook, etc?
@becomingguru oops, my bad - corrected. Will drop you an email
